game.name: Agreeee
game.shortDescription: Can you 'play' this game!? To play the thrilling action game, you must agree to all 12 terms and conditions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Can you 'play' this game!? To play the thrilling action game, you must agree to all 12 terms and conditions.

reviewHighlights.text: It's fun. I haven't gotten this angry at a video game since Dark Souls 1. There's also something strangely addictive about it that scratches the "just...
You already know this game is going to piss you off. So buy it and get pissed off. 9/10
